meanings.meaning: This indicates that a problem was detected in the camshaft position sensor circuit of bank 2. Since it says circuit, that means the problem could lie in any part of the circuit the sensor itself, the wiring, or the PCM. Don't just replace the CPS (camshaft position sensor) and think that will definitely fix it.

causes.cause: a wire or connector in the circuit could be grounded/shorted/broken
the camshaft position sensor may have failed
the crankshaft position sensor may have failed

descriptions.description: Camshaft Position Sensor A Circuit Malfunction (Bank 2)

solutions.solution: Check for continuity in the circuit wiring
Check the crankshaft position circuit as well
Check the operation (voltage) of the camshaft position sensor
Replace circuit wiring and/or connectors as required
Replace the camshaft position sensor as required
Visually inspect all the wiring and connectors in the circuit
